title: Vampire Hunters
description:
Vampire Hunters is a unique FPS that combines the adrenaline -pumping action of classic shooters with the innovative mechanics of the beloved Survivors-likes. Unleash your firepower as you stack up to 14 different weapons and craft absurd , impossibly awesome builds to mow down legions of vampires, demons, and other supernatural foes. LEGO Batman 2 DC Super Heroes
Control unique hunters — each with different abilities – and choose insane-yet-useful upgrades as you survive through the onslaught in this retro-inspired Bullet Heaven FPS.

system_requirements.Processor: 2.4 GHz Quad Core processor or higher
